analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x58ea375734e9a49a5abaafaa1cdcede99b375381.sol:
	Contract SiaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x58ea375734e9a49a5abaafaa1cdcede99b375381.sol#222)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x58ea375734e9a49a5abaafaa1cdcede99b375381.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
